Jeff hated bullies. Especially the one named Tony. He was a 6,2 feet high, hulking brute with, abnormal for a 16 year old boy, muscles that has terrorized the school since you remembered. Other kids tried to get him suspended or punished, but he always got away from the teachers with silliest of alibis. Jeff and his friend Mark were among his favorite punching bags. With the power of this web-side he can take his revenge and in the same time help others with the troublesome bully.

What will he do?
14522.title: Bullies

145221.content:
Jeff wrote Tony's name and surname on the web-side. All his data and a full body image showed up. He was disgusted as he looked on the face of his oppressor, but that was about to change. He wanted to morph Tony into the type of person he liked to bully the most - nerd. Jeff fiddled around with the data and changed many things about Tony. Now he was only 5 feet tall, devoid of any traits of physical activity he once had. His body type was now more feminine than masculine. His new pale skin suggested that he was never leaving his house for things other than school, his brown hair was changed from short to shoulder length and made greasy on top of that.

Jeff also made sure that he's dressed like a true nerd. He changed his normal attire to buttoned shirts that Tony now loved to wear above anything else and had many of them in various colors, in his collection alongside some ridiculous looking bow ties and ties. He also loved to wear cheap jeans and khaki pants hiked up higher on his waist. Of course the nerdy look wouldn't be complete without some thick glasses. In his new life he got nearsighted after reading too much books and playing far more video games than an average kid his age. Jeff didn't want them to be too much dorky though, it was more like an accessory than complemented his face and the rest of his clothes quite nicely.

Lastly he went to his quirk info, deleted his destructive behaviors and left him with some new ones. He now loved most of the nerdy stuff including learning,fantasy books, video games, sci-fi movies, anime and manga. No longer violent, he was a very polite little gentleman at least that's what his proud mother was saying. Former bully was now a sweet, little nerdy boy that just wanted to have some friends that he could help with everything he had. Of course he was shy and timid, due to his appearance and lack of confidence, but he would overcome it and talk with people he respected. He also liked to be called by his full name - Anthony to emphasis that professional nature of his.

Jeff clicked "confirm changes" button and let the magic happen. He checked for former bully's facebook page to see if anything had changed and it did. Tony's profile picture now matched the look that Jeff created on the web-side. Now he got rid off the one problem and could move to the next one, could he? Soon after he finished his mom called him:
"Jeff honey you have a guest!"

Wondering who could have visited his house Jeff ran downstairs to find a new friend smiling across the doors:
"H-hi Jeff. C-can I come in?"

It was Anthony.

What Jeff will do next?
145221.title: Get revenge on Tony

1452211.content:
Jeff was surprised at the sight of the uninvited guest. If he didn’t make this change himself ,he would not believed that the person before him used to be Tony. Former bully looked exactly like he made him look. Blue, long sleeved buttoned shit with red bow tie, khaki pants, big black, squared rimmed glasses. Despite being small, nerdy boy he seemed happy. Jeff realized that he was staring at him for far too long and answered his question:

„Yeah, why not. Come in.”

Anthony stepped though the door. There were so many thoughts that were appearing inside Jeff’s head. „Why is he here? What’s my relation with him now?" With all that was going on in his mind Jeff didn’t noticed that his guest carried a case with a laptop inside.

„I-I came for our usuall g-gaming afternoon” - said Anthony still smiling, looking at his friend.

Suddenly a new memories flooded into Jeff’s head. It appears that in this new reality that he created, Anthony considers him one of his few friends, today happens to be the day he comes to Jeff's house to play multiplayer games with him. Former memories of his seemed like a distant dream so he had to accept this new reality as fact. Another friend won’t hurt – though Jeff – besides he can’t have bad intentions now. I’ve made sure of it.

After a brief moment Jeff spoke:
„Alright come upstairs”

They went in Jeff’s room. Anthony unpacked his gaming laptop on the spare table in the corner. He was excited to be in the same room as the person he liked so much. He was sweating a little from the excitement, but thankfully his hankerchief was in his shirt pocket, so he used it to clean himself up. After he calmed himself Anthony carefully pulled every part from the bag. He knew that he wasn’t so nimble so he needed extra care with his expensive gaming equipment to be placed without any problems.

At the same time Jeff looked at his new buddy with curiosity. It whole situation should’ve felt unreal, but now he knew that they played together every week for a long time. Relieved that nothing will go wrong he spoke to Anthony:

„Alright you set yourself up, I will take a piss and we will start in about 5 minutes”

„O-ok” - answered Anthony shyly.

What happens next?
1452211.title: Let Anthony in

choices: Jeff comes back from the bathroom unaware of the changes
14522111.content:
While Jeff was still in the toilet Anthony waited for his laptop to boot. Coming to Jeff’s house was his favorite part of the week. On the one hand he liked to learn and spend his time alone, but deep down he knew that he was lonely. His family was overprotective and he couldn’t make friends that easily as other boys his age. This was one of the only times he could go outside his house, besides school so he enjoyed every second of it. He and Jeff could play online, but it wouldn’t be the same.

While his laptop was still booting up due to some kind of error Anthony looked around the room and noticed a weird site that was opened on Jeff’s PC. It contained all his psychical data, personality and even a photo of himself. "Was Jeff secretly a stalker?" - though Anthony at first. He took a closer look and noticed that the words in the boxes could be edited. He tried to wrote something silly - „His right hand is green” to test it out and suddenly it was indeed green. Anthony knew that reality was changed, but he couldn’t resist to think that his right hand was always green. He deleted this entry and watched his right hand returning to his original color.

„T-this site is insane!” - though Anthony - „I-I can’t believe that J-jeff didn’t tell me about it”.

He was a little disappointed with his friend, but now that he knew about unlimited power lying before him, he couldn’t be happier. Was he planing to improve his life and turn himself into a famous person? Of course not. He loved being who he is. Despite being dorky loser he couldn’t be happier. He planned to use the web-site to modify Jeff more into his liking. Despite being nice to him he knew that he wasn’t fully invested in the activities they shared together so he wanted to change it.

He opened the web-site on Jeff’s page and changed some things. He now will be more like Anthony - nerdy and pure. He made sure that Jeff wore similar clothes, had similar interests and quirks, and more importantly that he reduced the size of his dick to normal, because this thing was distracting. He also made sure that Jeff liked him more. When he was finished he got back to his page and wrote only one extra paragraph just in case – that he can change reality without the help of the web-site.

Anthony pressed enter and closed the web-site to avoid getting caught.

What happens next?
14522111.title: Anthony discovers the web-site

145221111.content:
Jeffrey was still inside the bathroom. He was so happy that he could spend some time with Anthony. He always wanted to have a close friend, but thanks to a mysterious web-site he finally got what he wanted. After he finished his thing he pulled his khaki pants up his waist and tucked his green shirt into them. When he finished washing his hands he looked at his image in the mirror. He was the same nerdy boy he's always been. His long sleeved green shirt with a black tie was as neat as always thanks to the efforts of his mom, his long, greasy, black hair tucked into the neat ponytail as usual. The only thing that was misplaced was his glasses. He giggled to himself as he adjusted them with his pale hand and smiled to his reflection. He was ready to spend some quality time with Anthony. He entered his room and announced:

„O-ok I'm done s-so we can finally p-play together!”

Anthony made a happy squeak much to Jeffrey’s surprise. He didn’t know why his friend was so happy all of the sudden. Maybe his body still adapts to this new reality and this sound was some kind of side effect. Jeffrey went to sit in front of his PC screen. He couldn’t remember closing the site that made his life better, but it didn’t boggled him too much. The most important thing was the effects this site had so far on his life. He didn't need anything else at the moment.

The usual gaming session was about to begin.

What happens next?
145221111.title: Jeff comes back from the bathroom unaware

choices: Jeff makes her (and himself) the only ones aware of the changes.
He gives her the opportunity to be the best girl she can be...
A cold fury, drove Jeff to make Toni as girly as possible.
Jeff's plans are interrupted when his mobile starts to ring.
145222.content:
As he typed in Tony's name, the web-site auto-completed the entry, and the data spawned onto the screen. In one corner of the screen, an image of Tony appeared, beneath that an identical image. The lower picture was labelled target, and filling the other half of the screen was a variety of sliders, toggles and other controllers. At the very base of the screen, was an icon 'Initiate Change'.

Scanning the various options, Jeff felt overwhelmed by the possibilities. But he knew Tony's reign of terror had to be ended. Realising, his strength was the ultimate recourse for Tony, he quickly set that to a more modest level. Also with a few swift taps, dropped him from 6' 2", down to a more manageable 5' 2".

He could now see, subtle changes in the target image. A slighter face, was the clearest.

"Almost looks androgynous." Even as he muttered the observation to himself, a clearer course of action became obvious. With a swipe of the toggle, Jeff changed his tormentor from Male to Female . The effect was immediate, as Tony's short cropped hair was erased by a flowing mane of chestnut brown locks. The face was still recognisably his.... well, hers, but also blessed with full lips, and high cheekbones.

Catching sight of another thing, he spotted she was now Toni, short for Antonia. The control options also shifted, when he swapped her gender. Tweaking the new controls, he played with Toni, as if she were his dolly. Toni became proficient with her make-up, accentuating her natural beauty with skilled hands.

He allowed her to keep her healthy athletic edge, (with a little refinement). Toni was the head-cheerleader, rather the a Jock.... more a Jill. Feeling a hint of anger, he balanced out her gains with something for himself. Toni was also the bustiest cheerleader, a firm, but mobile bust that interfered with her ability to do her cheers. In fact, it would lead to her being dismissed as eye-candy.

He nodded to himself, admiring the differences between Tony as he still was, and Toni as she'd soon be.
145222.title: Jeff ensures Tony never bullies anyone, ever again

choices: More changes to Tony (more like Janine)
More changes to Tony (traits like his mother)
More changes to Tony (traits like his grandmother)
1452221.content:
Jeff thought about what he was doing. It was way to quick and not very imaginative. Jeff decided to reset everything and look for more options. Jeff wanted to prolong his revenge. This might mean that he would be bullied a little more until he found the proper settings, but it would be worth it. Only he could know anything had changed and he could revel in what only he knew.

He looked down the selections on the page and found a button for more options. There were several pages to look at. Each selection had their own refinements. For example, when it came to hair, he could change length, style, curliness, color, the options were seemingly infinite. As he looked through them, he found Tony's family. He saw his mother, father and siblings. You could actually change his parents or any family relationship.

Jeff focused on Tony's little sister Janine. Jeff knew Janine, she was the sweetest little girl, only three years old and cute as a bug in a rug. For a moment, Jeff wondered how a guy like Tony could be related to a sweet little girl like Janine. Jeff clicked on Janine, to Tony's right on the screen Janine and her facts appeared. Jeff could compare Janine's facts with her brothers. Then He thought, what is he gave Jeff some of Janine's traits. He could make him an exact copy of her, but he didn't want to do that. As before that would be too quick. To see if his idea was possible, Jeff copied one of Janine's traits to Tony. As a test, he chose to swap hair. Immediately the picture of Tony changed. He no long had short cropped hair, but his hair was longer, down to his shoulder blade. It was now parted in the middle with two pig tails on either side of his head. Pink ribbons held the hair in place. It looked ridiculous on any male, but especially on a man as big and strong as Tony.

Jeff assumed that it worked when he pressed the submit button, but couldn't be sure until he saw it in person. Jeff decided that this was enough to do. He didn't want to make any more changes until he saw this one in action.

The next day when Jeff went to school he crept around to find Tony. Jeff crept around Tony many times, but usually so that Tony wouldn't see him. It didn't take long before he found Tony. Tony was easy to find if you were looking for him. He wasn't hiding from anyone. When Jeff saw him, Tony ad the hair style as Jeff expected and it was even more hilarious to see it in person. There was a slight change in that the ribbons that held Jeff's hair in place was a different color than on the screen, but Jeff just assumed that was because Janine was also wearing a different ribbon today. Her mom just had changed it to match her outfit.

Despite looking like a fool, Tony was still the school bully. He picked upon whoever he wanted and no one would say anything about his hair. Tony even liked that he could wear his hair as he wanted and no one would say a word. It was a sign of his strength he thought. He didn't know why he wanted his hair this way, but that was how he wanted it and no one had better say a word or they would get it worse than he would usually give it to them.

Jeff, loved the scene and decided when he went home he would make more changes.
1452221.title: Jeff makes her (and himself) the only ones awar...

14522211.content:
After thinking about it all day, Jeff decided to make a game out of changing Tony. Then he decided upon some rules. The first rule was only one change a day. He wanted to see how each change could effect Tony. Besides prolonging this would be a lot of fun. The second rule was no 'big' physical changes. What he meant was, he didn't want Tony to drop to his sister's height. He liked Tony looking tall and strong, even though other things would change about him. Things like hair was alright, because hair can grow back or be restyled. This gave Jeff an idea. He set it so that all the changes would be redone during the night. If Tony decides to cut his hair (for any reason) the next morning it would reset to the pig tails he has now. That would be for any other change that Jeff would think of.

Now that he has his rules, he determined to make another change to Tony using his little sister's traits as inspiration. Jeff opening up the options and saw Tony's information (including his new hair style with only looks right on toddlers) with his sister's right next to it. He looked over the choices for something to stand out. Most of the things were just too big a choice for the second time using it. He would save those for later. But then he found it, "VOICE." How would it be for big tough Tony to speak with the high pitched squeak of a little girl. Jeff made sure not to change Tony's vocabulary or intelligence, just his speaking voice. Jeff wondered how anyone would not crack up when Tony told them he would 'Fuck them up," a phrase his victims heard a lot.

Jeff selection the option and submitted the changes. Tony's picture on the screen didn't change, Jeff knew it had worked though. He would have to wait to hear it for himself.

The next day, when Jeff found Tony, he wasn't tormenting the students. He was with his girlfriend, Brittani. Brittani was a pretty girl who had been with Tony for over a year now. Jeff didn't know what she saw him him, but she apparently liked him. Jeff was too far away to hear what they were saying. Jeff purposefully tried to walk by them. When Brittani was around, Tony usually wouldn't provoke anyone, but that didn't mean you didn't have to be careful. You certainly couldn't stare at Brittani. But if you minded your own business that was one of the few times you were safe around Tony.

Brittani was doing most of the talking, but Tony in his little girl voice was cutely saying, "Yeah," "Right," and "I don't think so," as appropriate. Jeff suppressed a laugh at how the little girl voice was coming out of Tony's mouth.

Jeff thought he had an idea for the next trait change for Tony.

What happens next?
14522211.title: More changes to Tony (more like Janine)

choices: Why should TOny's gang get off scott free?
145222111.content:
Seeing Tony with a doll like Brittani gave Jeff an inspiration. he didn't know if it was possible but maybe it could be. Jeff looked through the options to find the right place. He thought that was he was looking for would be in the interest or hobbies categories. First he found Tony's interest in "girls" in general and in Brittani in particular. That wasn't too hard to find, but then he looked through Janine's preferences. It took some doing but he found what he wanted. As a three year old, Jeff assumed that Janine like dolls and had a special one she particularly liked. He found that was true. Janine loved dolls and stuffed animals and had a very special cloth doll that she loved. The doll's name was Katie. Jeff swapped Tony's interest in girls with Janine's interest in dolls. Then he swapped Jeff's love for Britanni with Janine's love for her favorite doll Katie. Jeff didn't know what would happen exactly. But he was sure that Tony and Brittani wouldn't be boyfriend/girlfriend anymore.

The next day, when Jeff found Tony he was clutching a rag doll in his right hand and had his hand over the throat of one of the students. This boy had been a 'friend' of Tony or at least in his gang.

"What should we do to him?" Tony asked (with the voice of a little girl) the doll in his arm. His voice was every more hilarious now that he was speaking in full sentences. To make matters worse he was actually asking the doll like it would talk back to him. The boy he was attacking was smaller than Tony and couldn't get away.

"oh you think so?" Tony said to the doll as if the doll and said something and Tony was responding.

Then to the trapped boy, "Katie says I should go easy on you. But I don't know."

The boy tried to say something, but Tony cut him off.

"Don't interrupt Katie when she is speaking." You felt for the boy, but it was so funny watching Tony 'speaking' to his doll. It didn't take long before whatever slight the boy had done was resolved and the crisis passed. Jeff thought the whole thing was hilarious. It was getting funnier and funnier every day. But Tony was still dangerous so Jeff egressed from the scene. When Jeff saw Tony in class, he was still carrying Katie. No one had a problem with that, not even the teacher.

What happens next?
145222111.title: Another trait for Tony

choices: Jeff makes a bigger change to Tony
1452221111.content:
Jeff thought that all his changes were very funny, Tony now had the hair style, voice and love of dolls of a toddler, but his temper was still volcanic. What could he do to help Tony deal with his temper? He wasn't ready to make a big change to his personality. Not yet anyway. But what could he do? "What do little kids do when they get all upset," he thought. Well the cry, but that didn't mean they didn't hit.

Jeff thought about it for a while and came up with something. He looked though Janine's options and found it. Everything that Janine knew or felt about sucking her thumb was copied into Tony's personality. Maybe now he won't hit anyone, he'll suck his thumb instead.

When Jeff caught up with Tony he was as mean as every even though he still had his doll and occasionally popped his thumb into his mouth. It might have calmed him down a bit, but when the thumb came out then you had better be careful. The thumb in his mouth was like the rattle of a rattlesnake. When you heard the loud sucking sounds you had better run. This time as it happened, it was Jeff who drifted to close to Tony when the sucking became loud. Jeff thought he was safe, but he wasn't.

Tony's little girl voice didn't sound so cute while he was pummeling you for some imagined slight.

What happens next?
1452221111.title: Still another trait for Tony

choices: Maybe it's time to swap Tony's apparel
14522211111.content:
Jeff was really mad since Tony had beaten him up. It would have been worse if Tony had used both hands instead of holding onto his dolly throughout. But even though he was essentially one handed, that was still plenty to take care of Jeff. That little girl voice that seemed so cute was no laughing matter anymore as Tony yelled at him either. When Jeff pulled one of the ribbons that made up Tony's pigtails in self defense, Tony became even more enraged.

Jeff was about to make a drastic change to Tony, maybe violating his own rule and give the big brute the strength of his little sister. But calmer heads prevailed. Things were going along so nicely and it was his fault he had gotten beaten up. Recently he had been avoiding Tony, but ever since changing him Jeff sought him out. Tony probably noticed and that's why he got beaten up. Tony might have also intuited that Jeff was laughing at him.

It probably would be easier if Tony didn't notice so much. Then Jeff had a Eureka moment. Toddlers have a very sort attention span. Jeff found the option and gave Tony the attention span equivalent to that of his little three year old sister. Jeff didn't know how this would effect Tony but what's the difference. If this 'didn't work' then there was always another thing to try tomorrow.

When Jeff saw Tony the next day, he seemed the same. He was still carrying his dolly and his thumb was firmly stuck in his mouth. He was with one of his friends they were talking. Jeff didn't want to get close enough to find out, he had 'bullied' Jeff the day before and Jeff was still a bit sore. Jeff watched for a few minutes nothing seem to change. When all of a sudden, Tony just started to run. Jeff didn't know why. It seemed some birds were tweeting in a near by tree and Tony ran to see them. The brightly colored birds flew away as Tony watched. His friend caught up with him. For the friend and everyone else, Tony's tiny attention span was normal.

What happens next?
14522211111.title: Jeff continues small changes

145222111111.content:
"Tony had become more and more like a toddler but now was the time to make a 'big' change," Jeff thought. With his cute voice and pigtails, not to mention his dolly, it was probably time to give him a wardrobe with was more in line with his new traits. This was going to be a huge change . He was going to replace Tony's entire wardrobe with exact copies of a three year old, except these clothes would for him. Jeff was proud of himself that it took a week before he cot to the most obvious trait swap there was.


Looking through the options, Jeff swapped every one of Tony's traits that had to do with clothing with his little sister Janine. There was many options, tops, bottoms, shoes and socks and Jeff wanted each option to be exactly the same. Jeff didn't know if this was what Janine (the toddler) liked or just what her mom selected for her. How much of a choice did toddler's have when it came to dressing? Jeff didn't know. But he was eager to see how Tony would be dressed the next day.

When he saw him, Jeff wasn't disappointed. Tony was wearing a white short sleeves t-shirt with the pink panther on the front. The panther had his usual rye smile and was wearing glasses in the shape of hearts. He wore a matching pink leggings with a darker pink footprint pattern throughout. The leggings were made for a toddler in such a way that the area around crotch was extended to allow for a diaper. It was clear that there was indeed a diaper (or at least training pants.) On his feet he wore anklet socks although his sneakers did light up in the back as he took a step. His outfit fit better with his haircut how. In fact the ribbons used to tie his pigtails matched his shirt and leggings.

Jeff watched Tony for a while. Except for the clothes he was the same as before. He was still menacing, even though he was dressed like a small girl, but easily distracted, Jeff had learned his lesson and kept his distance while observing Tony. The question that kept occurring to Jeff was did he use those diapers that he was obviously wearing. Jeff didn't give (or is it take away) the potty control of a toddler. Jeff wasn't going to stalk the bathroom or follow Tony to find out, but he thought to everyone else everything is quite normal, maybe someone already knows.

Jeff found his friend Mark and casual brought it up in conversation, "You know Tony wear's diapers?"

"Everyone knows that?"

Does he need them. I mean does he you know in his pants?"

"No, I have seen him in the mensroom. he pulls down his pants and then his diapers and stands in front of the toilet and pees. It's disgusting. His bear ass is always showing, he doesn't close the door."

"I wonder why he wearing a diaper then?"

"He just likes it. As far as I know he has always worn diapers."

"Strange."

"Well like you are going to argue with him. He's big enough to wear what he wants.

What happens next?
145222111111.title: Maybe it's time to swap Tony's apparel

choices: Swap Tony's coordination with a toddlers
1452221111111.content:
Jeff decided that if Tony was going to wear diapers that he should also use them. Wearing diapers was an accident. Jeff hadn't thought about that Janine was wearing diapers when he gave Tony all her clothes, But she was toddlers and that is what toddlers wear. No one at school seemed to mind, but there isn't any reason to wear diapers without using them. Jeff didn't make a distinction between diapers and pull-ups since he didn't have any younger siblings of his own. To him diapers were diapers.

Jeff looked through the options again and found what he was looking for. he had been through these options many times by now and didn't have much trouble finding anything. Jeff found everything Janine knew about potty training and swapped that knowledge with Tony's.

When Jeff saw Tony the next day, he was again wearing a t-shirt. This one had a tri-colored back ground of light pink, light peach and a bit of white. Over that was printed in script "this girl can" surrounded by two butterflies. He wore black, red and yellow striped leggings. It was clear that he was wearing a diaper underneath from the bulge. His pigtails had a peach colored bow to tie them off which matched his shirt. On his feet were the same sneakers that lit up when he ran although the socks were probably different. In his arm, he carried his dolly. Jeff had never seen Tony without it since he made the swap. Tony took his dolly everywhere and it was usually in his arms, even in class.

Tony was as mean as ever, still tormenting the students as he wanted. Jeff didn't know it, but Tony felt better today than yesterday, he felt superior. He could run the school and he still wasn't fully potty trained. He wondered why the other students bothered. Diapers felt so comfortable and people could use the potty without having any accidents, but they still feared him. Tony pottied when he remembered, but not always. At night he wore nighttime diapers. His mom tried to encourage him to wear 'big girl panties' but that didn't work on him. If Tony had his choice, he wouldn't learn to potty.

There was one good thing about pottying Tony thought, if he said he had to potty he could leave the room during class. He would be sent to the nurse, who had a special potty chair for him and she would supervise his pottying. If he had soaked his diaper, she would give him a new one.

Even though Tony was now dressed like a toddler including the pullups, he could dress himself. Jeff hadn't changed Tony's ability to get dressed. Janine could put on anything that didn't have a snap. But buttons and other fasteners confused her. She also had no clue when it come to tying her own shoes. Tony didn't have any of these difficulties.

Tony was only in one of Jeff's classes. Jeff watched carefully, but couldn't see anything. Tony didn't seem to be paying much attention to the teacher, but Jeff didn't know if that was because of his tiny attention span or he didn't care. Tony hadn't spent much time learning the class lessons even before Jeff changed his reality. Jeff watched Tony for a while, but didn't see anything. Jeff realized, that unless the diaper leaked as long as Tony wore pants, there was no way of knowing if he wet himself. That was the point of the diaper. Jeff just assumed that it worked as everything else had worked up unto this point.

There wasn't anything for Jeff to see anyway. The class before, Tony had raised his hand and in his cute little girl voice said, "I have to potty." Tony spent almost fifteen minutes on the potty before he let loose. The nurse told him he was a good boy and sent him back to class. She gave the teacher a note saying that he had indeed pottied.

What happened next?
1452221111111.title: Maybe poitty training

14522211111111.content:
Jeff didn't know whether Tony wet his diapers or not. He assumed he did, but it wasn't like he could see a yellow wet spot when Tony was wearing pants over the diaper. But what concerned him was that Tony was as mean as ever. Tony seemed soft and kind when it came to his dolly, Katie, but when it came to other people he was still a bully. Jeff wanted to help out the bullied students but he agreed in his rules not to make Tony three feet tall or have the strength of a toddler.

Jeff racked his brains looking through the options when he found on. What if Tony had the coordination of a toddler. That might take the strength out of him. Jeff wasn't sure, but it was worth a shot. He then found the appropriate selector from the scream and gave Tony the exact same coordination of his little toddler sister.

When Jeff caught up with Tony he was still tormenting one of the students. The student, Jeff didn't know his name, had pushed Tony away in self defense. Tony almost fell on his butt. The student then started to run. Tony took up the chase but he wasn't running right. He didn't take his long strides as he had been. His gait now was more side to side, with his legs farther apart. He also held his hands up and a bit out to keep his balance. The result was that Tony was running much slower. The student almost got away, if not for Tony's gang who wrangled the boy back into Tony's clutches.

When Tony had caught up, instead of punching the boy, Tony flailed his arms up and down in slapping motions. But Tony was still very strong and even though the student could block most of the slaps they did hurt.

Jeff mused that if it wasn't for Tony's friend, the student would have gotten away. Jeff decided to fix that.

In class, Tony would have had a hard time writing his assignments if he had done so. He spent most of his time daydreaming while sucking his thumb and clutching his dolly.

What happens next?
14522211111111.title: Swap Tony's coordination with a toddlers

choices: Jeff decides more swaps are in order
145222111111112.content:
Despite all that Jeff had done to Tony, Tony was still a bully terrorizing the school. "What Tony needs," Jeff thought, "was someone to watch him and keep him from bothering others." Then Jeff had another Eureka moment. Toddlers always have someone watching them. Toddlers are never left alone. They have no independence at all. That was it, he could give Tony the independence of a toddler. Then how could he do anything, someone would be watching him. Jeff looked for the option. Once discovered Jeff changed Tony's independence to be the same as his little sister. Jeff wondered how that would work out since Tony was still a student in high school.

152.title: Sarah, 14 year old Freshman

1522.content:
Sarah stared in silence at the crowded webpage that filled her laptop’s display. Menus within menus within windows within sections made it a difficult read, all crowded with a clearly function-over-form mentality. The only thing that caught Sarah’s eyes with the slight blue shade to one of the page’s many empty forms.

Please enter the subject’s first and last name (if applicable).

For a moment, Sarah just stared, trying to figure out what sort of sick joke the website would end up being. Or maybe it was something more sinister. Identity theft, building a list of gullible email addresses for later phishing attempts? She wasn’t putting her name in there, that was for sure.

Pausing to glance down at her cat Thomas, who brushed against her leg with a self-satisfied purr, Sarah noticed yet again the scratch running down her right arm. Face shifting from a smile at her cat to a frown at the mark, she found herself once again mentally going over the events that had led to the minor injury. Her crush, Jacob Miller, and an extra ticket to the local university cinema’s anniversary Nausicaa of the Valley of the Wind showing. She thought it was a perfect combination, and after a few hours practicing the night before had built up the courage to ask him.

She couldn’t help but tear up at the thought of how he had snapped at her. The look of disgust, the hate that dripped from his voice. It wasn’t like she was having a good day to begin with. She was used to suffering through the usual bullies, but Jacob? She had ran away crying so hard that she may as well have taken off her glasses. She still wouldn't have seen the open locker door that she ran into. The resulting fall had left scrapes and cuts, but as usual the worst injury of the day had nothing to do with her body. Unlike the dull numbness of her arm, the humiliation and regret still stung as clearly and painfully as in the moment.

Sickened self-disgust now turning into cold anger, Sarah entered Jacob Miller into the empty form. To her immense surprise, an unmistakable portrait of her classmate immediately appeared.

She stared at the picture in silence for several moments before drawing her attention to the several new text windows that now even further crowded her screen.

Please select the desired change(s)

A long list of options, phrased as intentions such as “Change subject’s x” or “Remove subject’s x” appeared as she opened the drop-down menu below. Head spinning, she clicked one at random simply to see what would happen.

Change subject’s…

Please describe modification.

Instead of another drop-down menu, there was now another form for her to apparently describe a… modification? Sarah wasn’t sure what that meant, but the thought of changing anything about Jacob filled her with a wicked burst of glee. The first thing would be his precious hair: Jacob cared about his swooped stylish semi-pompadour look more than most girls cared about their own hairstyle.

Change subject’s hair to a buzzcut.

The form turned a pale green. The portrait flashed white and then reappeared, now showing Jacob looking like he had just started bootcamp.

Modification understood. Would you like to make an additional change?

Sarah couldn’t help herself. Despite her surprise at the portrait’s change, she wasn’t reacting in concern but in sheer glee. A grin played at her lips as she continued.

Add to the subject…

Sarah stared at her hands as she thought of something to add to this ridiculous little power fantasy. Immediately her attention was brought to her hello-kitty themed nail art. Jacob had torn into her for her self-described lolita look, calling her immature and even disgusting for her interest in the less-than-typical “pedobait” fashion. With a new burst of fury, Sarah went to work.

Give subject fake nails. The fake nails are long and pink and are glued on. Decorate nails with nail art; bows, hearts, glitter, lace designs, all shades of pink and white.

The new image of Jacob’s undeniably male hands now sporting nail art to make hers seem butch had Sarah laughing hard enough to scare away Thomas. As the form flashed green and the previous question returned, she glanced at the computer clock and sighed. Selecting no at the option for additional changes, she thought about just closing the browser and going to bed when a new section appeared.

Please describe how this changes function:

Who is aware of these changes?

Sarah stared at the text form. What did this even mean? Interested but still tired, she typed in “me”. A new question immediately appeared below.

The subject and all others besides yourself will not notice these changes. Confirm?

Sarah clicked the confirm button, still confused but interested in seeing what would happen next.

Are these changes permanent and impervious to subject’s attempts at self-modification? If not, how long will they be in effect or how may they be removed?

Sarah snickered at the thought of Jacob being stuck with nail art for the rest of his life. “Yes” filled the green-flashing text form.

For additional change function options, select More. If you wish to make this an EZ-Change, select Finish.

Sarah glanced again at the clock. Despite her curiosity, she selected Finish. She would have come back to this after school. Another flash of green.

Do you wish to make these changes irrevocable? WARNING, change and its functions cannot be edited after confirmation.

Sarah was taken aback by the oversized warning that flashed onto the screen. Out of an almost involuntary instinct, she selected No.

You initially dismiss the e-mail, just another piece of Spam. It's just a new address, and you haven't mentioned it, or used it with anyone, so you put off deleting it.

Somehow, it plays on your mind, as you send off résumés in a bid to reduce your student debts. When you take a break for a coffee, you find yourself thinking about who might have sent it, or why it was sent. Your anti-virus kicked up no warnings, and it's not asking for money, or telling you how to earn $$$$$, for only five minutes work a month.

Your thoughts eventually run towards more sexual directions as you throw the last of the coffee back. The afternoon passes with more e-mails to prospective employers. Finally you work it out, it HAD to have come from your friends.

Charles, call me Charlie. Bill, just Bill, and Jack, real name Jackson. Perhaps they are planning on taking the piss with whatever you type in. A fairer world... a sexual preference... or whatever....

Three o'clock rolls around, and you find yourself unable to concentrate on the Job hunting. So you go to the web address, and enter the Login, and Password.

You feel a little disappointed. There's no fireworks, no laughing faces. It's a very dull screen with a slowly pulsing cursor in an empty text box.

Hoping to provoke a reaction, you type quickly and accurately.

My University friends, Charlie, Bill and Jack, are always surrounded by beautiful, willing, voluptuous women.

Nothing happens, when you hit enter, and you let out a disappointed sigh. A small box darkens into existence, 'Confirm'.

With a simple -click- you send away your little reality shift.

"Your request has been accepted and will be processed at the next sleep shift."

If it's a joke, it's not funny. It's not even amusing, you close the tab and go back to work.

The rest of the afternoon provides only a few automated replies, thanking you for your interest, and we'll keep your details on file.

But finally, you head out for well-earned beer.

Adam sat in the living room of his apartment, working on a paper for his history class, when he got a notification for an email. The site had a menu of different categories of changes he could make. There were people, history, global, and objects, among many other things. The description said that he could enter practically anything and make changes.

Astonishingly an image of the tv currently sitting in front of him popped up on the screen as well as a variety of checkboxes, text boxes, and dropdown menus. At the top was a switch reading off. Adam clicked it to on and pressed confirm changes. As he did so the tv turned on. A dial with the current channel appeared on the site. He used it to switch the channel.

You have made a noticeable change to reality. By default, Reality Shift sets all changes to only be noticeable to you, and all others will have their memory adapt. You can change these settings at any time.

Adam clicked on the disclaimer and saw that the options were
- Changes are only noticed by you

info.brief_description: One day, you get an e-mail about an interesting web service you didn't sign up for.
info.description:
One day, you get an e-mail about having been accepted into a Closed Beta test for a web service that you do not remember ever signing up for. The site itself seems to be set up to do just as its namesake suggests.

Most all kinds of alterations or transformations to the world of the story are allowed. This includes but is not limited to; Time travel, morphing or transforming any subject to something (or someone) else, history revision, etc.

Anything goes!

Note: I may edit some additions to correct grammar or spelling for ease of reading.
